GEN_QUESTIONS.description: Choose 0.1.0 if the project is an experimentation (or will not be pushed to production after first draft).
.env file are useful to store credentials (Database, WEB API tokens etc..)
.npmrc file are useful to configure npm (Proxy, Registery etc..)

GEN_QUESTIONS.description: Most of the time it's only required for CLI projects. Say 'no' if you dont know why you need this.
